name: Ankur Prasad
body: ## *Why CSCE656?* As a Graduate student in computer engineering, I have spent most of my time exploring the various aspects of VLSI design. Now, in my final semester, I decided to diversify a little with this fascinating course which brings to light the nuances of interaction between Humans and Computational Media.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
